controls.title: Establish system access requirements
controls.summary: Limit information system access to authorized users, processes acting on behalf of authorized users or devices (including other information systems).

controls.title: Control internal system access
controls.summary: Limit information system access to the types of transactions and functions that authorized users are permitted to execute.

controls.title: Limit data access to authorized users and processes
controls.summary: Verify and control/limit connections to and use of external information systems.

controls.title: Limit data access to authorized users and processes
controls.summary: Control information posted or processed on publicly accessible information systems.

controls.title: Grant access to authenticated entities
controls.summary: Identify information system users, processes acting on behalf of users or devices.

controls.title: Grant access to authenticated entities
controls.summary: Authenticate (or verify) the identities of those users, processes or devices, as a prerequisite to allowing access to organizational information systems.

controls.title: Sanitize media
controls.summary: Sanitize or destroy information system media containing Federal Contract Information (FCI) before disposal or release for reuse.

controls.title: Limit physical access
controls.summary: Limit physical access to organizational information systems, equipment and the respective operating environments to authorized individuals.

controls.title: Limit physical access
controls.summary: Escort visitors and monitor visitor activity.

controls.title: Limit physical access
controls.summary: Maintain audit logs of physical access.

controls.title: Limit physical access
controls.summary: Control and manage physical access devices.

controls.title: Control communications at system
controls.summary: Monitor, control and protect organizational communications (e.g., information transmitted or received by organizational information systems) at the external boundaries and key internal boundaries of the information systems.

controls.title: Control communications at system
controls.summary: Implement subnetworks for publicly accessible system components that are physically or logically separated from internal networks.

controls.title: Identify and manage information system
controls.summary: Identify, report and correct information and information system flaws in a timely manner.

controls.title: Identify malicious content
controls.summary: Provide protection from malicious code at appropriate locations within organizational information systems.

controls.title: Identify malicious content
controls.summary: Update malicious code protection mechanisms when new releases are available.

controls.title: Identify malicious content
controls.summary: Perform periodic scans of the information system and real-time scans of files from external sources as files are downloaded, opened or executed.
